mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT D.jobname FROM CMS_JOBDEF D WHERE D.jobcode = T.jobcode) jobname, jobcode, jobplancode, jobplancode key, jobplandesc, repeatinterval, (SELECT codename FROM CMS_CODEDEF M WHERE M.code = T.repeatunit AND M.codetype = 'jobPlan') repeatunit, (CASE WHEN useflag = '1' THEN '启用' WHEN useflag = '0' THEN '停止' ELSE '' END) useflag, (CASE WHEN T.useflag = '0' THEN '停止运行' ELSE (CASE WHEN T.triggerstate = '1' THEN '正在运行' ELSE '等待运行' END) END) runstate, (SELECT P.paramvalue FROM CMS_JOBPLANPARAM P WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.paramcode = 'IP' AND P.jobplancode = T.jobplancode) paramvalue, TO_CHAR (T.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') startdate FROM CMS_JOBPLANDEF T ORDER BY T.makedate DESC

SELECT jobcode, jobplancode, (SELECT M.jobclassname FROM CMS_JOBDEF M WHERE M.jobcode = T.jobcode) jobclassname, DATE_FORMAT (startdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') startdate, DATE_FORMAT (enddate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') enddate, repeatinterval, repeatunit FROM CMS_JOBPLANDEF T WHERE T.useflag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_JOBPLANDEF (JOBPLANCODE,JOBCODE,JOBPLANDESC,RUNTYPE,REPEATINTERVAL,REPEATUNIT,STARTDATE,ENDDATE,USEFLAG,TRIGGERSTATE, MAKEDATE,MAKEUSER,MODIFYDATE,MODIFYUSER,CRONEXP) VALUES(#{jobPlanCode},#{jobCode},#{jobPlanDesc},#{runType},#{repeatInterval},#{repeatUnit},TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{useFlag},#{triggerState}, TO_DATE(#{makeDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{makeUser},TO_DATE(#{modifyDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{modifyUser},#{cronExp})
